pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Between Different IBD-State Labelling Schemes. // Convert "label", "lexicographic", "jacquard" and "vec", full state description vector. All conversions are done to and from "label", as used in IBD_Haplo. More information regarding IBD_Haplo can be found at http://www.stat.washington.edu/thompson/Genepi/pangaea.shtml.
